title: A city in manland China or Taiwan

content.question: Choose ONE city in mainland China or Taiwan (Beijing, Shanghai, Taipei, etc.). In your presentation, describe this city in mainland China or Taiwan and explain its significance.

frqParts.text: Choose ONE city in mainland China or Taiwan (Beijing, Shanghai, Taipei, etc.). In your presentation, describe this city in mainland China or Taiwan and explain its significance.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
